cast.overview: Phillip is a wealthy quadriplegic who needs a caretaker to help him with his day-to-day routine in his New York penthouse. He decides to hire Dell, a struggling parolee who's trying to reconnect with his ex and his young son. Despite coming from two different worlds, an unlikely friendship starts to blossom.
cast.title: The Upside

details.biography: Born in the US of Ecuadorian parents, he and his family moved to Ecuador at the age of 5, where he grew up until he graduated high school at 17. Upon graduation, he immediately went to Boston to fulfill a lifelong dream (his second, next to acting) of joining the Marines. His unit was deployed to Afghanistan shortly after 9/11, as one of the first responders of Operation Enduring Freedom.He served for four years, and then moved to NYC to get to work on that first dream he had since watching E.T. as a child.
details.name: Diego Aguirre
